data.text: @krazystylesivs You're most welcome. We appreciate you reaching out to us for assistance.
@krazystylesivs Great! You can follow up on the status of your request by calling 1-868-669-3000 Ext 2411/ 2415 thereafter. We look forward to getting this resolved for you.

@krazystylesivs Hi, ticket refunds can only be made through the channel through which you originally bought the ticket? How did you purchase yours online, at a ticket office, via phone or a travel agent?

@PipCartwright Hi, ticket refunds can only be made through the channel through which you originally bought the ticket? How did you purchase yours; online, at a ticket office, via phone or a travel agent?

data.text: @tiannajoseph14 We're truly disheartened to learn that you had a poor customer experience as it is the exact opposite of what we pride ourselves on. Thank you for bringing this to our attention as it will help us improve our operations and services.
@cremalicious Hi there, you may reach out to our Cargo Services office for assistance regarding transporting your TV set. Here are the contact numbers: https://t.co/hwi6OHrJV1
@maeri5062 We were very grateful for your patience, Maria. We hope you have a great week!
@khadine868 We've sent you a DM with some clarification. Let us know if you understand
@MerMusique Hi there, there is no specific number. You'd need to call Piarco International Airport at 669-4868 for assistance
@MerMusique Hi Mer, you may contact the Piarco International Airport  at 1 868-669-4880.
@khadine868 We appreciate your suggestion, Khadine. Would you mind submitting your feedback to our team so they'd know how to improve? You may submit this here: https://t.co/dt0dvMVMfc.
@khadine868 Hi Khadine, you actually do have the option to keep them: miles extension or miles re-activation. Read here for more info: https://t.co/kufU1oBNoP

@khadine868 If you'd like to check on your Caribbean Miles account, we would be happy to assist with this. Please reach out to our Caribbean Miles Department. Here are our contact numbers: https://t.co/t3y6WLFEyU.

data.text: @khadine868 Hi Khadine, please note that If no Miles are credited to your account in a consecutive 12-month period, your account will be considered inactive. If no Miles are credited to your account in a consecutive 36-month period, the account will become expired.

data.text: @CorettaJoe You're most welcome Coretta. We appreciate your continued support and it's always a pleasure serving you. We hope to see you soon!

@DancinJuicyLane We're truly sorry for the delay and inconvenience. Our Baggage Services team will happily provide you with an update. Could you please give us a call so that we may assist? https://t.co/k7huBCQDMN
@DancinJuicyLane We're truly sorry for the delay, Lisajane. We hope that you're able to speak with an agent soon.

@shoesbyFIS Hi Jihan, we're really sadden to hear that you're aunt had this experience with us and we'd like to assist. You may submit this on our website here: https://t.co/PK4H81gnTj. Our team will review this and contact you.
@jazzsin08045877 We'd be happy to clarify this for you. Could you please reach out to our Reservations Department. Here are our contact numbers: https://t.co/j9qIO0F5nN.
@jazzsin08045877 Have you checked your flight status on our website here?: https://t.co/5fuqaQxUVn

@fannycatagomez Hi Fanny, we're truly saddened to hear of your situation but do note that we're working hard to get everything sorted out and we are very grateful for the patience you have shown us throughout

@jazzsin08045877 We truly appreciate your patience, Paco. Keep checking our Facebook page and website for updates: https://t.co/pvLhdH0r0c

data.text: @fionabren  we're truly disheartened to hear of your experience. We do work hard to get you to your destination safely and on time.
@TamikaBrownnn Hi Tamika, we'd be happy to assist. You may reach out to our Reservation Department to follow up on your refund. Here are our contact numbers: https://t.co/DVMjWvSQnn.

@Shamid60443879 We're definitely open to hearing the different ways in which you think we can make improvements and we once again invite you to complete our Customer Relations form: https://t.co/65HzFGlbIN
